title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Kansas Exhibits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Kansas Exhibits                 Kansas Exhibits       Travel the trail by reading exhibits in towns across Missouri, Kansas, Colorado, Oklahoma, and New Mexico. Kansas saw a lot of trail traffic from 1821 to 1880. Council Grove Dodge City Area Dodge City Ruts Gardner Junction Kaw Nation Nine Mile Point Sapling Grove Strang Park Westport Landing       Have you been to Westport Landing? Nine wayside exhibits tell the stories of the people, the bridges, the Town of Kansas, and the goods transported by steamboat up the Missouri River in the 1800s. NPS        BACK TO EXHIBITS PAGE
